entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
